title: Your Next Family SUV Could Also be Your First Home Battery
description: The street is dark, your neighbors’ houses are out, and your kids are still watching Netflix like nothing happened. The difference is sitting in your driveway. Vehicle-to-home charging turns a Kia EV9 or Hyundai Ioniq 9 into a giant backup battery for your house, not just a way to skip gas ...
titleSummary: "Family Vehicles May Double as Power Hubs for Sustainable Homes"
descriptionSummary: As night falls, the street lights dim and neighbors' homes go dark, but you're lit up - literally. Your kids remain glued to Netflix screens, unaware of the energy revolution in your driveway: a plug-and-play power boost from your EV9 or Ioniq 9.

title: Kia Carnival, Sportage, and Seltos Set November Sales Records in America
description: Kia had another bumper sales month in November, with the Korean marque selling 72,002 vehicles in the United States. This is a 3% year-over-year increase and the brand’s best November ever. Kia also says the November result ensures it will achieve its third consecutive all-time annual sales record. ...

descriptionSummary: Kia continues to surge forward with an impressive sales performance in November, delivering 72,002 vehicles in the US - a 3% jump from last year and a new brand record for the month. This strong showing sets up Kia for another all-time high annual sales mark.

title: This Influential Wall Street Expert Has a Bleak Prediction For Tesla
description: If you follow Wall Street and/or have watched the 2015 Academy Award-winning film The Big Short, the name Michael Burry may ring a bell. titleSummary: "Tesla Warning Issued by Renowned Analyst with Dim Outlook for Electric Car Maker"
descriptionSummary: Michael Burry's name has been etched into financial lore due to his prescient warnings about the 2008 crisis, immortalized in the hit film The Big Short. For those familiar with Wall Street, his story is a cautionary tale of foresight and hubris.

description: If you’re someone in the tax bracket of affording a six-figure Ferrari, then this Purosangue should be of interest. Although Maranello has been busy churning out as many of these as they can, these V12s are still in high demand. It shouldn’t come as a surprise that Ferrari is fairly picky with who ...

title: Why the BMW E46 Is Still Everyone’s Favorite Modern 3 Series
description: Which BMW 3 Series is the best 3 Series? You'll probably hear the second-generation E30 or the fourth-generation E46 as the top answers. It's totally understandable, though, as those two are often regarded as peak models. The E46 3 Series is a proper classic now. It was introduced on November 11, ...

title: Ford CEO Jim Farley Asks If You Want An Affordable High-Performance RWD Sedan
description: Sedans have become scarce, particularly from American automakers, and at Ford, they're completely extinct. In order to make the Bronco and Maverick happen, the Fusion and Focus had to be sacrificed and their manufacturing plants retooled, said Ford CEO Jim Farley, in an interview with Forrest's ...
titleSummary: "Farley Asks: Can Americans Afford a Budget-Friendly Muscle Car?"
descriptionSummary: American sedans have all but vanished from the market, a casualty of the rise of utility vehicles. To make room for its new SUVs and crossovers, Ford's sedan lineup has been phased out, says CEO Jim Farley.

title: Toyota's New Supercar Will Share The Spotlight With A Lexus Twin
description: Only three days ago, Toyota teased its new sports car, which will be named GR GT. Now, the Japanese automaker has given us another teaser image and announced that the GR GT will be just one of three new sports cars to be revealed on December 5. title: Forgotten Aston Martin DB5 Becomes $1.3 Million Showstopper After Incredible Restoration
description: Between its potent performance, gorgeous lines, and presence in the James Bond film Goldfinger, the Aston Martin DB5 has achieved legendary status. descriptionSummary: The iconic Aston Martin DB5 has cemented its place in history with its impressive performance, sleek design, and memorable appearance in the James Bond film Goldfinger. Its influence can be seen in today's high-performance GTs. Only a limited production run of 1,022 models between 1963 and 1965 adds to its allure.

description: Before the Mustang GTD era swallowed most of Ford's performance attention, there was another factory-backed monster waiting in the wings. description: Automotive lawsuits cover a wide range of issues. They are usually filed for faulty products, missing features, or, worst, for vehicle occupant safety being put on the line. descriptionSummary: Automotive lawsuits often stem from defects in design, manufacturing, or functionality. However, the most alarming cases involve compromised vehicle safety, which is a crucial factor in consumer purchasing decisions.

description: Detroit automaking mainstay General Motors is making a massive investment to substantially boost its output of gas-powered models at its US factories. descriptionSummary: A consolidated class-action lawsuit is reigniting concerns over Honda's "sticky steering" issue, which was previously addressed through a 1.7-million-vehicle recall in 2024, but plaintiffs now claim the remedy fell short.

descriptionSummary: Hyundai has proven itself a master of reinvention, boosting its performance credentials with bold new models. A prime example is the game-changing Ioniq 5 N, a high-performance flagship that redefined electric vehicles.

descriptionSummary: Koenigsegg consistently makes headlines with its remarkable achievements, showcasing the skill of its engineers in pushing boundaries on and off the track, despite being a small-volume manufacturer. Its reputation as a powerhouse in precision engineering is well-deserved.

title: Florida Man Says Small Water Spill Caused $12,000 in Damage to His Hyundai Ioniq 5
description: Electric vehicles (EVs) and water tend to spark dramatic headlines, but the truth is they aren't natural enemies. descriptionSummary: While electric vehicles and water may seem like an unlikely pair, reality reveals a more nuanced relationship. Many modern EVs boast watertight batteries and submersible electrical systems, capable of withstanding even the toughest aquatic conditions.
